So hi navabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā jiṇṇabhāvaṃ appatto majjhe paribhogakālepi dubbaṇṇo ca dukkhasamphasso ca appagghoyeva ca hoti. Atibahuṃ agghanto aḍḍhaṃ agghati. Jiṇṇakāle pana aḍḍhamāsakaṃ vā kākaṇikaṃ vā agghati. ^b^Ukkhaliparimajjana^eb^nti kāḷukkhaliparipuñchanaṃ.

[03]^b^Navo^eb^ti upasampadāya pañcavassakālato heṭṭhā jātiyā saṭṭhivassopi navoyeva. ^b^Dubbaṇṇatāyā^eb^ti sarīravaṇṇenapi guṇavaṇṇenapi dubbaṇṇatāya. Dussīlassa hi parisamajjhe nisinnassa nittejatāya sarīravaṇṇopi na sampajjati, guṇavaṇṇe vattabbameva natthi. ^b^Ye kho panassā^eb^ti ye kho pana tassa upaṭṭhākā vā ñātimittādayo vā etaṃ puggalaṃ sevanti. ^b^Tesaṃ ta^eb^nti tesaṃ puggalānaṃ cha satthāre sevantānaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ viya, devadattaṃ sevantānaṃ kokālikādīnaṃ viya ca taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti. ^b^Majjhimo^eb^ti pañcavassakālato paṭṭhāya yāva navavassakālā majjhimo nāma. ^b^Thero^eb^ti dasavassakālato paṭṭhāya thero nāma. ^b^Evamāhaṃsū^eb^ti evaṃ vadanti. ^b^Kiṃ nu kho tuyha^eb^nti tuyhaṃ bālassa bhaṇitena ko atthoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Tathārūpa^eb^nti tathājātikaṃ tathāsabhāvaṃ ukkhepanīyakammassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ.

[03]^b^117^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāsikavatthūpamesu ^a^M0.0067^ea^ – ^b^kāsikavatthaṃ^eb^ nāma tayo kappāsaṃsū gahetvā kantitasuttena vāyitaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ. Taṃ navavāyimaṃ anagghaṃ hoti. Paribhogamajjhimaṃ vīsampi tiṃsampi sahassāni agghati. Jiṇṇakāle pana aṭṭhapi dasapi sahassāni agghati.

[03]^b^Tesaṃ^eb^^a^V0.0065^ea^^b^taṃ hotī^eb^ti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhādayo sevantānaṃ viya taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ ^a^P0.0217^ea^ hitāya sukhāya hoti. Sammāsambuddhañhi ekaṃ nissāya yāvajjakālā muccanakasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi. Tathā sāriputtattheramahāmoggallānatthere avasese ca asītimahāsāvake nissāya saggaṃ gatasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi. Yāvajjakālā tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ paṭipannasattānampi pamāṇaṃ natthiyeva. ^b^Ādheyyaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti tassa mahātherassa taṃ atthanissitaṃ vacanaṃ yathā gandhakaraṇḍake kāsikavatthaṃ ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbataṃ gacchati, evaṃ uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ hadaye ca ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbatampi gacchati. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^118^eb^^b^.^eb^ Suppameyyādīsu – sukhena pametabboti ^b^suppameyyo. Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sattaloke. ^b^Uddhato^eb^ti uddhaccena samannāgato. ^b^Unnaḷo^eb^ti uggatanaḷo; tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitoti attho. ^b^Capalo^eb^ti pattamaṇḍanādinā cāpallena samannāgato. ^b^Mukharo^eb^ti mukhakharo. ^b^Vikiṇṇavāco^eb^ti asaṃyatavacano. ^b^Asamāhito^eb^ti cittekaggatārahito. ^b^Vibbhantacitto^eb^ti bhantacitto, bhantagāvībhantamigīsappaṭibhāgo. ^b^Pākaṭindriyo^eb^ti vivaṭindriyo. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ‘suppameyyo’ti vuccati. Yathā hi parittassa udakassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati; evameva imehi aguṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati. Tenesa ‘suppameyyo’ti vutto.

[03]^b^119^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dukkhena pametabboti ^b^duppameyyo. Anuddhatā^eb^dīni vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbāni. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ‘duppameyyo’ti vuccati. Yathā hi mahāsamuddassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati; evameva imehi guṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati. Tādiso ‘anāgāmī nu kho, khīṇāsavo nu kho’ti vattabbataṃ gacchati, tenesa ‘duppameyyo’ti vutto.
[03]^b^120^eb^^b^.^eb^ Na ^a^M0.0068^ea^ sakkā pametunti ^b^appameyyo^eb^. Yathā hi ākāsassa na sakkā pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ, evaṃ khīṇāsavassa. Tenesa ‘appameyyo’ti vutto.

[03]^b^121^eb^^b^.^eb^ Na sevitabbādīsu – ^b^na sevitabbo^eb^ti na upasaṅkamitabbo. ^b^Na bhajitabbo^eb^ti na allīyitabbo. ^b^Na payirupāsitabbo^eb^ti na santike nisīdanavasena punappunaṃ upāsitabbo. ^b^Hīno^eb^^a^V0.0066^ea^^b^hoti sīlenā^eb^tiādīsu upādāyupādāya hīnatā veditabbā ^a^P0.0218^ea^. Yo hi pañca sīlāni rakkhati, so dasa sīlāni rakkhantena na sevitabbo. Yo pana dasa sīlāni rakkhati, so catupārisuddhisīlaṃ rakkhantena na sevitabbo. ^b^Aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca. Attano atthāya eva hi evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo. Anuddayānukampāvasena pana taṃ upasaṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^122^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sadiso hotī^eb^ti samāno hoti. ^b^Sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ sata^eb^nti sīlena samānabhāvaṃ gatānaṃ santānaṃ. ^b^Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatī^eb^ti evaṃ samānasīlānaṃ amhākaṃ sīlameva ārabbha kathā bhavissati. ^b^Sā ca no phāsu bhavissatī^eb^ti sā ca sīlakathā amhākaṃ phāsuvihāro sukhavihāro bhavissati. ^b^Sā ca no pavattinī bhavissatī^eb^ti sā ca amhākaṃ kathā divasampi kathentānaṃ pavattinī bhavissati, na paṭihaññissati. Dvīsu hi sīlavantesu ekena sīlassa vaṇṇe kathite itaro anumodati; tena tesaṃ kathā phāsu ceva hoti, pavattinī ca. Ekasmiṃ pana dussīle sati dussīlassa sīlakathā dukkathāti neva sīlakathā hoti, na phāsu hoti, na pavattinī. ^b^Samādhipaññākathāsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. Dve hi samādhilābhino samādhikathaṃ, sappaññā ca paññākathaṃ kathentā, rattiṃ vā divasaṃ vā atikkantampi na jānanti.

[03]^b^123^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sakkatvā garuṃ katvā^eb^ti sakkārañceva garukārañca karitvā. ^b^Adhiko hotī^eb^ti atireko hoti. ^b^Sīlakkhandha^eb^nti sīlarāsiṃ. ^b^Paripūressāmī^eb^ti taṃ atirekasīlaṃ puggalaṃ nissāya attano aparipūraṃ sīlarāsiṃ paripūraṃ karissāmi. ^b^Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmī^eb^ti ettha sīlassa ^a^M0.0069^ea^ asappāye anupakāradhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāradhamme sevanto tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlakkhandhaṃ paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma. ^b^Samādhipaññākkhandhesu^eb^pi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^124^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jigucchitabbādīsu – ^b^jigucchitabbo^eb^ti gūthaṃ viya jigucchitabbo. ^b^Atha kho na^eb^nti atha kho assa. ^b^Kittisaddo^eb^ti kathāsaddo. ^b^Evameva^eb^nti ettha gūthakūpo viya dussīlyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gūthakūpe patitvā ṭhito dhamanīahi viya dussīlapuggalo. Guthakūpato uddhariyamānena tena ahinā purisassa sarīraṃ āruḷhenāpi adaṭṭhabhāvo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassāpi ^a^P0.0219^ea^ tassa kiriyāya ^a^V0.0067^ea^ kāraṇabhāvo sarīraṃ gūthena makkhetvā ahino gatakālo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassa pāpakittisaddassa abbhuggamanakālo veditabbo.

[03]^b^125^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tindukālāta^eb^nti tindukarukkhaalātaṃ. ^b^Bhiyyoso mattāya cicciṭāyatī^eb^ti tañhi jhāyamānaṃ pakatiyāpi papaṭikāyo muñcantaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāti saddaṃ karoti. Ghaṭṭitaṃ pana adhimattaṃ karotīti attho. ^b^Evameva^eb^nti evamevaṃ kodhano attano dhammatāyapi uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati. Appamattakaṃ pana vacanaṃ vuttakāle ‘mādisaṃ nāma evaṃ vadatī’ti atirekataraṃ uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati. ^b^Gūthakūpo^eb^ti gūthapuṇṇakūpo, gūtharāsiyeva vā. Opammasaṃsandanaṃ panettha purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tasmā evarūpo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo, na sevitabbo^eb^ti yasmā kodhano atiseviyamānopi atiupasaṅkamiyamānopi kujjhatiyeva, ‘kiṃ iminā’ti paṭikkamantopi kujjhatiyeva, tasmā palālaggi viya ajjhupekkhitabbo, na sevitabbo. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yo hi palālaggiṃ atiupasaṅkamitvā tappati, tassa sarīraṃ jhāyati. Yo atipaṭikkamitvā tappati, tassa sītaṃ na vūpasammati. Anupasaṅkamitvā apaṭikkamitvā pana majjhattabhāvena tappentassa sītaṃ vūpasammati, kāyopi na ḍayhati. Tasmā palālaggi viya kodhano puggalo majjhattabhāvena ajjhupekkhitabbo, na sevitabbo, na bhajitabbo, na payirupāsitabbo.

[03]^b^126^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kalyāṇamitto^eb^ti sucimitto. ^b^Kalyāṇasahāyo^eb^ti sucisahāyo. ^b^Sahāyo^eb^ti sahagāmī saddhiṃcaro. ^b^Kalyāṇasampavaṅko^eb^ti kalyāṇesu ^a^M0.0070^ea^ sucipuggalesu sampavaṅko, tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāramānasoti attho.

[03]^b^127^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sīlesu paripūrakārītiādīsu – ^b^sīlesu paripūrakārino^eb^ti ete ariyasāvakā yāni tāni maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāni, ādibrahmacariyakāni, pārājikasaṅkhātāni cattāri mahāsīlasikkhāpadāni, tesaṃ avītikkamanato yāni khuddānukhuddakāni āpajjanti, tehi ca vuṭṭhānato sīlesu yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ paripūraṃ samattaṃ karontīti ‘sīlesu paripūrakārino’ti vuccanti. Samādhipāribandhakānaṃ pana kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ, paññāpāribandhakassa ca saccapaṭicchādakassa mohassa ^a^P0.0220^ea^ asamūhatattā, samādhiṃ paññañca bhāventāpi samādhipaññāsu yaṃ ^a^V0.0068^ea^ kattabbaṃ taṃ mattaso pamāṇena padesamattameva karontīti ^b^samādhismiṃ paññāya ca mattaso kārino^eb^ti vuccanti. Iminā upāyena itaresupi dvīsu nayesu attho veditabbo.
[03]Tatrāyaṃ aparopi suttantanayo –

[08]‘‘Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ mattaso kārī, paññāya mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni tāni āpajjatipi, vuṭṭhātipi. Taṃ kissa hetu? Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttā. Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni, tattha dhuvasīlo ca hoti, ṭhitasīlo ca, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti, avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu…pe… so tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā, rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā, sakadāgāmī hoti; sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī. So yāni tāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ…pe… anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā. Idha pana, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0071^ea^, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya paripūrakārī. So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni…pe… sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. So āsavānaṃ khayā…pe… upasampajja viharatī’’ti (a. ni. 3.87).

[03]^b^130^eb^^b^.^eb^ Satthāraniddese – ^b^pariññaṃ paññapetī^eb^ti pahānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapeti. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti tesu tīsu janesu. ^b^Tena daṭṭhabbo^eb^ti tena paññāpanena so satthā ^b^rūpāvacarasamāpattiyā lābhī^eb^ti daṭṭhabboti attho. Dutiyavārepi eseva nayo. ^b^Sammāsambuddho satthā tena daṭṭhabbo^eb^ti tena titthiyehi asādhāraṇena paññāpanena ayaṃ tatiyo satthā sabbaññubuddho daṭṭhabbo. Titthiyā hi kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapentā rūpabhavaṃ vakkhanti. Rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapentā ^a^P0.0221^ea^ arūpabhavaṃ vakkhanti. Vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapentā asaññabhavaṃ vakkhanti. Sammā paññapentā ‘evaṃ paññapeyyuṃ’, no ca sammā paññapetuṃ sakkonti. Sammāsambuddho pana kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ pahānaṃ anāgāmimaggena paññapeti ^a^V0.0069^ea^. Rūpavedanānaṃ pariññaṃ pahānaṃ arahattamaggena paññapeti. ^b^Ime tayo satthāro^eb^ti ime dve janā bāhirakā, eko sammāsambuddhoti – imasmiṃ loke tayo satthāro nāma.

[03]^b^131^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye satthāraniddese – ^b^diṭṭhe ceva dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃ attabhāve. ^b^Attānaṃ saccato thetato paññapetī^eb^ti ‘‘attā nāmeko atthi nicco dhuvo sassato’’ti bhūtato thirato paññapeti. ^b^Abhisamparāyañcā^eb^ti aparasmiṃ attabhāve evameva paññapeti. Sesamettha vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
[06]Tikaniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^132^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catukkaniddese – ^b^asappuriso^eb^ti lāmakapuriso. Pāṇaṃ atipātetīti ^b^pāṇātipātī^eb^. Adinnaṃ ādiyatīti ^b^adinnādāyī^eb^. Kāmesu micchā caratīti ^b^kāmesumicchācārī^eb^. Musā vadatīti ^b^musāvādī^eb^. Surāmerayamajjapamāde tiṭṭhatīti ^b^surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī.^eb^

[03]^b^133^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāṇātipāte^eb^^a^M0.0072^ea^^b^ samādapetī^eb^ti yathā pāṇaṃ atipāteti, tathā naṃ tattha gahaṇaṃ gaṇhāpeti. Sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo yasmā sayaṃ katena ca dussīlyena samannāgato yañca samādapitena kataṃ, tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādo, tasmā ^b^asappurisena asappurisataro^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Sappuriso^eb^ti uttamapuriso.
[03]^b^135^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sappurisena sappurisataro^eb^ti attanā katena susīlyena samannāgatattā yañca samādapito karoti. Tato upaḍḍhassa dāyādattā uttamapurisena uttamapurisataro.
[03]^b^136^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāpo^eb^ti akusalakammapathasaṅkhātena dasavidhena pāpena samannāgato.

[03]^b^138^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kalyāṇo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0070^ea^ kusalakammapathasaṅkhātena dasavidhena kalyāṇadhammena samannāgato suddhako ^a^P0.0222^ea^ bhadrako. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
[03]^b^140^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pāpadhammādīsu – pāpo dhammo assāti ^b^pāpadhammo^eb^. Kalyāṇo dhammo assāti ^b^kalyāṇadhammo^eb^. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.

[03]^b^144^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sāvajjādīsu – ^b^sāvajjo^eb^ti sadoso. ^b^Sāvajjena kāyakammenā^eb^ti sadosena pāṇātipātādinā kāyakammena. Itaresupi eseva nayo. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa sadosattā, gūthakuṇapādibharito padeso viya sāvajjoti vuccati.

[03]^b^145^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sāvajjena bahula^eb^nti yassa sāvajjameva kāyakammaṃ bahu hoti, appaṃ anavajjaṃ; so sāvajjena bahulaṃ kāyakammena samannāgato, appaṃ anavajjenāti vuccati. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Ko pana evarūpo hotīti? Yo gāmadhammatāya vā nigamadhammatāya vā kadāci karahaci uposathaṃ samādiyati, sīlāni pūreti. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ^a^M0.0073^ea^ tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammesu sāvajjasseva bahulatāya anavajjassa appatāya ^b^vajjabahulo^eb^ti vuccati.

[03]Yathā hi ekasmiṃ padese dubbaṇṇāni duggandhāni pupphāni rāsikatānassu, tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ atimuttakavassikapāṭalāni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ. Evarūpo ayaṃ puggalo veditabbo. Yathā pana ekasmiṃ padese atimuttakavassikapāṭalāni rāsikatānassu, tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ dubbaṇṇaduggandhāni badarapupphādīni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ. Evarūpo tatiyo puggalo veditabbo. Catuttho pana tīhipi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa niddosattā, catumadhurabharitasuvaṇṇapāti viya daṭṭhabbo. Tesu paṭhamo andhabālaputhujjano. Dutiyo antarantarā kusalassa kārako lokiyaputhujjano. Tatiyo sotāpanno sakadāgāmianāgāminopi eteneva saṅgahitā. Catuttho khīṇāsavo. So hi ekantena anavajjoyeva. Ayaṃ aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyo.

[03]^b^148^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ugghaṭitaññūādīsu – ^b^ugghaṭitaññū^eb^ti ettha ^b^ugghaṭitaṃ^eb^ nāma ^a^P0.0223^ea^ ñāṇugghāṭanaṃ, ñāṇe ugghaṭitamatteyeva ^a^V0.0071^ea^ jānātīti attho. ^b^Saha udāhaṭavelāyā^eb^ti udāhāre udāhaṭamatteyeva. ^b^Dhammābhisamayo^eb^ti catusaccadhammassa ñāṇena saddhiṃ abhisamayo. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ ‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo ugghaṭitaññūti vuccati.

[03]^b^149^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vipañcitaṃ vitthāritameva atthaṃ jānātīti ^b^vipañcitaññū. Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ saṅkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe bhājiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo vipañcitaññūti vuccati.
[03]^b^150^eb^^b^.^eb^ Uddesādīhi netabboti ^b^neyyo. Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotī^eb^ti anukkamena arahattappatti.

[03]^b^151^eb^^b^.^eb^ Byañjanapadameva ^a^M0.0074^ea^ paramaṃ assāti ^b^padaparamo. Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotī^eb^ti na tena attabhāvena jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ sakkotīti attho.

[03]^b^152^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yuttapaṭibhānādīsu – paṭibhānaṃ vuccati ñāṇampi, ñāṇassa upaṭṭhitavacanampi. Taṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttañca paṭibhānamassāti ^b^yuttappaṭibhāno^eb^. Pucchitānantarameva sīghaṃ byākātuṃ asamatthatāya no muttaṃ paṭibhānamassāti ^b^no muttappaṭibhāno^eb^. Iminā nayena sesā veditabbā. Ettha pana paṭhamo – kiñci kālaṃ vīmaṃsitvā yuttameva pekkhati, ^b^tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero^eb^ viya. So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho pariggahetvā yuttapayuttakāraṇameva katheti.

[03]Dutiyo – pucchānantarameva yena vā tena vā vacanena paṭibāhati, vīmaṃsitvāpi ca yuttaṃ na pekkhati ^b^catunikāyikapaṇḍitatissatthero^eb^ viya. So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho pañhapariyosānampi nāgameti, yaṃ vā taṃ vā kathetiyeva. Vacanatthaṃ panassa vīmaṃsiyamānaṃ katthaci na laggati.

[03]Tatiyo – pucchāsamakālameva yuttaṃ pekkhati, taṅkhaṇaññeva vacanaṃ byākaroti ^b^tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero^eb^^a^V0.0072^ea^ viya. So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho sīghameva katheti, yuttapayuttakāraṇo ca hoti.
[03]Catuttho – puṭṭho samāno neva yuttaṃ pekkhati ^a^P0.0224^ea^, na yena vā tena vā paṭibāhituṃ sakkoti tibbandhakāranimuggo viya hoti ^b^lāḷudāyitthero^eb^ viya.

[03]^b^156^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dhammakathikesu – ^b^appañca bhāsatī^eb^ti sampattaparisāya thokameva katheti. ^b^Asahitañcā^eb^ti kathento ca pana na atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttaṃ katheti. ^b^Parisā cassa na kusalā hotī^eb^ti sotuṃ nisinnaparisā cassa yuttāyuttaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ siliṭṭhāsiliṭṭhaṃ na jānātīti attho. ^b^Evarūpo^eb^ti ayaṃ evaṃjātiko bāladhammakathiko. Evaṃjātikāya bālaparisāya dhammakathikotveva nāmaṃ labhati. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Ettha ca dveyeva janā sabhāvadhammakathikā, itare pana dhammakathikānaṃ antare paviṭṭhattā evaṃ vuttā.

[03]^b^157^eb^^b^.^eb^ Valāhakūpamesu ^a^M0.0075^ea^^b^valāhakā^eb^ti meghā. ^b^Gajjitā^eb^ti thanitā. Tattha gajjitvā no vassanabhāvo nāma pāpako. Manussā hi yathā devo gajjati ‘suvuṭṭhikā bhavissatī’ti bījāni nīharitvā vapanti. Atha deve avassante khette bījāni khetteyeva nassanti, gehe bījāni geheyeva nassantīti dubbhikkhaṃ hoti. No gajjitvā vassanabhāvopi pāpakova. Manussā hi ‘imasmiṃ kāle dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissatī’ti ninnaṭṭhānesuyeva vappaṃ karonti. Atha devo vassitvā sabbabījāni mahāsamuddaṃ pāpeti, dubbhikkhameva hoti. Gajjitvā vassanabhāvo pana bhaddako. Tadā hi subhikkhaṃ hoti. No gajjitvā no vassanabhāvo ekantapāpakova.
[03]^b^Bhāsitā hoti no kattā^eb^ti ‘idāni ganthadhuraṃ pūressāmi, vāsadhuraṃ pūressāmī’ti kathetiyeva, na pana uddesaṃ gaṇhāti, na kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāveti.

[03]^b^Kattā hoti no bhāsitā^eb^ti ‘ganthadhuraṃ vā pūressāmi vāsadhuraṃ vā’ti na bhāsati. Sampatte pana kāle tamatthaṃ sampādeti. Iminā nayena itarepi veditabbā. Sabbaṃ panetaṃ paccayadāyakeneva kathitaṃ. Eko hi ‘asukadivase nāma dānaṃ dassāmī’ti saṅghaṃ nimanteti, sampattakāle no karoti. Ayaṃ puggalo puññena parihāyati, bhikkhusaṅghopi lābhena parihāyati ^a^V0.0073^ea^. Aparo saṅghaṃ animantetvāva sakkāraṃ katvā ‘bhikkhū ānessāmī’ti na labhati, sabbe aññattha nimantitā honti. Ayampi puññena parihāyati ^a^P0.0225^ea^, saṅghopi tena lābhena parihāyati. Aparo paṭhamaṃ saṅghaṃ nimantetvā, pacchā sakkāraṃ katvā dānaṃ deti, ayaṃ kiccakārī hoti. Aparo neva saṅghaṃ nimanteti, na dānaṃ deti, ayaṃ ‘pāpapuggalo’ti veditabbo.

[03]^b^158^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mūsikūpamesu – ^b^gādhaṃ kattā no vasitā^eb^ti attano āsayaṃ bilaṃ kūpaṃ khaṇati, no tattha vasati, kismiñcideva ṭhāne vasati, evaṃ biḷārādiamittavasaṃ gacchati. Khattātipi pāṭho. ^b^Vasitā no gādhaṃ kattā^eb^ti sayaṃ na khaṇati, parena khate bile vasati, evaṃ jīvitaṃ rakkhati. Tatiyā dvepi karontī, jīvitaṃ rakkhati. Catutthā dvepi akarontī amittavasaṃ gacchati. Imāya pana upamāya upamitesu puggalesu ^a^M0.0076^ea^ paṭhamo yathā sā mūsikā gādhaṃ khaṇati, evaṃ navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ uggaṇhāti. Yathā pana sā tattha na vasati, kismiñcideva ṭhāne vasantī, amittavasaṃ gacchati; tathā ayampi pariyattivasena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā catusaccadhammaṃ na paṭivijjhati, lokāmisaṭṭhānesuyeva caranto maccumārakilesamāradevaputtamārasaṅkhātānaṃ amittānaṃ vasaṃ gacchati. Dutiyo yathā sā mūsikā gādhaṃ na khaṇati, evaṃ navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ na uggaṇhāti. Yathā pana parena khatabile vasantī jīvitaṃ rakkhati; evaṃ parassa kathaṃ sutvā catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vasaṃ atikkamati. Iminā nayena tatiyacatutthesupi opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^159^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ambūpamesu – ^b^āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇī^eb^ti anto āmaṃ bahi pakkasadisaṃ. ^b^Pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇī^eb^ti anto pakkaṃ bahi āmasadisaṃ. Sesadvayesupi eseva nayo. Tattha yathā ambe apakkabhāvo āmatā hoti, evaṃ puggalepi puthujjanabhāvo āmatā, ariyabhāvo pakkatā. Yathā ca tattha pakkasadisatā pakkavaṇṇitā; evaṃ puggalepi ariyānaṃ abhikkamanādisadisatā pakkavaṇṇitāti – iminā nayena upamitapuggalesu opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^160^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kumbhūpamesu ^a^P0.0226^ea^ – ^b^kumbho^eb^ti ghaṭo. ^b^Tuccho^eb^ti anto ritto. ^b^Pihito^eb^ti pidahitvā ṭhapito. ^b^Puro^eb^ti anto puṇṇo. ^b^Vivaṭo^eb^ti vivaritvā ṭhapito. Upamitapuggalesu panettha anto guṇasāravirahito ^a^V0.0074^ea^ tuccho bāhirasobhanatāya pihito puggalo veditabbo. Sesesupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^161^eb^^b^.^eb^ Udakarahadūpamesu – ^b^udakarahado^eb^ tāva jaṇṇumattepi udake sati paṇṇarasasambhinnavaṇṇattā vā bahalattā vā udakassa apaññāyamānatalo ^b^uttāno gambhīrobhāso^eb^ nāma hoti. Tiporisa catuporisepi pana udake sati acchattā udakassa paññāyamānatalo ^b^gambhīro uttānobhāso^eb^ nāma hoti. Ubhayakāraṇasambhāvato pana itare dve veditabbā. Puggalopi kilesussadabhāvato guṇagambhīratāya ca abhāvato guṇagambhīrānaṃ sadisehi abhikkamādīhi yutto ^b^uttāno gambhīrobhāso^eb^ nāma. Iminā nayena sesāpi veditabbā.

[03]^b^162^eb^^b^.^eb^ Balībaddūpamesu ^a^M0.0077^ea^ – ^b^balībaddo^eb^ tāva yo attano gogaṇaṃ ghaṭṭeti ubbejeti, paragogaṇe pana sorato sukhasīlo hoti – ayaṃ ^b^sakagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo^eb^ nāma. Puggalopi attano parisaṃ ghaṭṭento vijjhanto pharusena samudācaranto, paraparisāya pana soraccaṃ nivātavuttitaṃ āpajjanto ^b^sakagavacaṇḍo hoti no paragavacaṇḍo^eb^ nāmāti. Iminā nayena sesāpi veditabbā. Niddesavāre panettha ^b^ubbejitā hotī^eb^ti ghaṭṭetvā vijjhitvā ubbegappattaṃ karoticceva attho.

[03]^b^163^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āsīvisūpamesu – ^b^āsīviso^eb^ tāva yassa visaṃ āsuṃ āgacchati sīghaṃ pharati; ghoraṃ pana na hoti, cirakālaṃ na pīḷeti – ayaṃ ^b^āgataviso no ghoraviso^eb^. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Puggalavibhājanaṃ pana uttānatthameva.
[03]^b^164^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hotī^eb^tiādīsu ^b^ananuviccā^eb^ti atulayitvā, apariggaṇhitvā. ^b^Apariyogāhetvā^eb^ti paññāya guṇe anogāhetvā.

[03]^b^166^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhūtaṃ taccha^eb^nti vijjamānato bhūtaṃ, aviparītato ^b^tacchaṃ. Kālenā^eb^ti yuttapayuttakālena. ^b^Tatra kālaññū hotī^eb^ti yamidaṃ ^a^P0.0227^ea^ kālenāti vuttaṃ. Tatra yo puggalo kālaññū hoti, kālaṃ jānāti, tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇatthāya ‘‘imasmiṃ kāle pucchitenāpi mayā ^a^V0.0075^ea^ na kathetabbā, imasmiṃ kāle kathetabbā’’ti – ayaṃ kālena bhaṇati nāma. ^b^Upekkhako viharatī^eb^ti majjhattabhūtāya upekkhāya ṭhito hutvā viharati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthameva.

[03]^b^167^eb^^b^.^eb^ Uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvītiādīsu – yo uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti, taṃ pana uṭṭhānaṃ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṃ na paṭilabhati, taṃ sandhāya ^b^yassa puggalassa uṭṭhahato^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tatūpari devā^eb^ti tato upari brahmakāyikādayo devā. Tesañhi uṭṭhānavīriyena kiccaṃ nāma natthi. Puññaphalameva upajīvanti. ^b^Puññavato cā^eb^ti idaṃ puññavante khattiyabrāhmaṇādayo ceva bhummadeve ādiṃ katvā nimmānaratipariyosāne deve ca sandhāya ^a^M0.0078^ea^ vuttaṃ. Sabbepi hete vāyāmaphalañceva puññaphalañca anubhavanti. Nerayikā pana neva uṭṭhānena ājīvaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkonti, nāpi nesaṃ puññaphalena koci ājīvo uppajjati.

[03]^b^168^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tamādīsu – ‘‘nīce kule paccājāto’’tiādikena tamena yuttoti ^b^tamo^eb^. Kāyaduccaritādīhi puna nirayatamūpagamanato ^b^tamaparāyaṇo. Nesādakule^eb^ti migaluddakādīnaṃ kule. ^b^Venakule^eb^ti vilīvakārakule. ^b^Rathakārakule^eb^ti cammakārakule. ^b^Pukkusakule^eb^ti pupphachaḍḍakakule. ^b^Kasiravuttike^eb^ti dukkhavuttike. ^b^Dubbaṇṇo^eb^ti paṃsupisācako viya jhāmakhāṇuvaṇṇo. ^b^Duddasiko^eb^ti vijātamātuyāpi amanāpadassano. ^b^Okoṭimako^eb^ti lakuṇḍako. ^b^Kāṇo^eb^ti ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā. ^b^Kuṇī^eb^ti ekahatthakuṇī vā ubhayahatthakuṇī vā. ^b^Khañjo^eb^ti ekapādakhañjo vā ubhayapādakhañjo vā. ^b^Pakkhahato^eb^ti hatapakkho pīṭhasappī. ^b^Padīpeyyassā^eb^ti telakapallakādino padīpūpakaraṇassa. ^b^Evaṃ puggalo tamo hoti tamaparāyaṇo^eb^ti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṃ adisvā mātukucchismiññeva kālaṃ katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalepi kappe saṃsarati. Sopi tamo tamaparāyaṇova. So pana kuhakapuggalo bhaveyya. Kuhakassa hi evarūpā nibbatti hotīti vuttaṃ.

[03]Ettha ca ^b^nīce kule paccājāto^eb^^a^P0.0228^ea^^b^ hoti caṇḍālakule vā^eb^tiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva pubbuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā. ^b^Dalidde^eb^tiādīhi pavattipaccayavipatti. ^b^Kasiravuttike^eb^tiādīhi ājīvupāyavipatti. ^b^Dubbaṇṇo^eb^tiādīhi rūpavipatti. ^b^Bahvābādho^eb^tiādīhi dukkhakāraṇasamāyogo. ^b^Na lābhī^eb^tiādīhi sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ^a^V0.0076^ea^ ca. ^b^Kāyena duccarita^eb^ntiādīhi tamaparāyaṇabhāvassa kāraṇasamāyogo. ^b^Kāyassa bhedā^eb^tiādīhi samparāyikatamūpagamo. Sukkapakkho vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo.

[03]Apicettha tividhāya kulasampattiyā paccājātiādikena jotinā yuttato ^b^joti,^eb^ ālokabhūtoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāyasucaritādīhi pana saggūpapattijotibhāvūpagamanato ^b^jotiparāyaṇo. Khattiyamahāsālakule vā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^khattiyamahāsālā^eb^ti khattiyā mahāsārā ^a^M0.0079^ea^ mahāsārappattā khattiyā. Yesañhi khattiyānaṃ heṭṭhimantena koṭisataṃ nidhānagataṃ hoti, tayo kahāpaṇakumbhā vaḷañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapitā honti, te khattiyamahāsālā nāma. Yesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ nihitaṃ hoti, diyaḍḍho kahāpaṇakumbho vaḷañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti, te ^b^brāhmaṇamahāsālā^eb^ nāma. Yesaṃ gahapatīnaṃ cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ nihitaṃ hoti, kahāpaṇakumbho vaḷañjatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti, te ^b^gahapatimahāsālā^eb^ nāma. Tesaṃ kuleti attho. ^b^Aḍḍhe^eb^ti issare. Nidhānagatadhanassa mahantatāya ^b^mahaddhane^eb^. Suvaṇṇarajatabhājanādīnaṃ upabhogabhaṇḍānaṃ mahantatāya ^b^mahābhoge^eb^. Nidhānagatassa jātarūparajatassa pahūtatāya ^b^pahūtajātarūparajate^eb^. Vittūpakaraṇassa tuṭṭhikaraṇassa pahūtatāya ^b^pahūtavittūpakaraṇe^eb^. Godhanādīnañca sattavidhadhaññānañca pahūtatāya ^b^pahūtadhanadhaññe. Abhirūpo^eb^ti sundararūpo. ^b^Dassanīyo^eb^ti aññaṃ kammaṃ pahāya divasampi passitabbayutto. ^b^Pāsādiko^eb^ti dassaneneva cittapasādāvaho. ^b^Paramāyā^eb^ti uttamāya. ^b^Vaṇṇapokkharatāyā^eb^ti pokkharavaṇṇatāya. Pokkharaṃ vuccati sarīraṃ. Tassa vaṇṇasampattiyāti attho. ^b^Samannāgato^eb^ti upeto.

[03]^b^169^eb^^b^.^eb^ Oṇatoṇatādīsu ^a^P0.0229^ea^ – diṭṭhadhammikāya vā samparāyikāya vā sampattiyā virahito ^b^oṇato^eb^. Nīco, lāmakoti attho. Tabbipakkhato ^b^uṇṇato^eb^. Ucco, uggatoti attho. Sesamettha tamādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Apica – ^b^oṇatoṇato^eb^ti idāni nīco, āyatimpi nīcova bhavissati. ^b^Oṇatuṇṇato^eb^ti idāni nīco, āyatiṃ ucco bhavissati. ^b^Uṇṇatoṇato^eb^ti idāni ucco, āyatiṃ nīco bhavissati. ^b^Uṇṇatuṇṇato^eb^ti idāni ucco, āyatimpi uccova bhavissatīti.

[03]^b^170^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rukkhūpamesu – rukkho tāva ^b^pheggusāraparivāro^eb^ti vanajeṭṭhakarukkho sayaṃ pheggu hoti ^a^V0.0077^ea^, parivārarukkhā panassa sārā honti. Iminā nayena sesā veditabbā. Puggalesu pana sīlasāravirahato pheggutā, sīlācārasamannāgamena ca sāratā veditabbā.

[03]^b^171^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rūpappamāṇādīsu ^a^M0.0080^ea^ – sampattiyuttaṃ rūpaṃ pamāṇaṃ karotīti ^b^rūpappamāṇo^eb^. Tattha pasādaṃ janetīti ^b^rūpappasanno^eb^. Kittisaddabhūtaṃ ghosaṃ pamāṇaṃ karotīti ^b^ghosappamāṇo^eb^. Ārohaṃ vātiādīsu pana – ^b^āroha^eb^nti uccattanaṃ. ^b^Pariṇāha^eb^nti kisathūlabhāvāpagataṃ parikkhepasampattiṃ. ^b^Saṇṭhāna^eb^nti aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ dīgharassavaṭṭatādiyuttaṭṭhānesu tathābhāvaṃ. ^b^Pāripūri^eb^nti yathāvuttappakārānaṃ anūnataṃ, lakkhaṇaparipuṇṇabhāvaṃ vā. ^b^Paravaṇṇanāyā^eb^ti parehi parammukhā nicchāritāya guṇavaṇṇanāya. ^b^Parathomanāyā^eb^ti parehi thutivasena gāthādiupanibandhanena vuttāya thomanāya. ^b^Parapasaṃsanāyā^eb^ti parehi sammukhā vuttāya pasaṃsāya. ^b^Paravaṇṇahārikāyā^eb^ti paramparathutivasena parehi pavattitāya vaṇṇaharaṇāya.

[03]^b^172^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cīvaralūkha^eb^nti cīvarassa dubbaṇṇādibhāvena lūkhataṃ. ^b^Pattalūkha^eb^nti bhājanassa vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavatthūhi lūkhataṃ. ^b^Senāsanalūkha^eb^nti nāṭakādisampattivirahena senāsanassa lūkhataṃ. ^b^Vividha^eb^nti acelakādibhāvena anekappakāraṃ. ^b^Dukkarakārika^eb^nti sarīratāpanaṃ.

[03]Aparo nayo – imesu hi catūsu puggalesu rūpe pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno rūpappamāṇo nāma. Rūpappasannoti tasseva atthavacanaṃ. Ghose pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ghosappamāṇo ^a^P0.0230^ea^ nāma. Cīvaralūkhapattalūkhesu pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno lūkhappamāṇo nāma. Dhamme pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno dhammappamāṇo nāma. Itarāni tesaṃyeva atthavacanāni. Sabbasatte ca tayo koṭṭhāse katvā dve koṭṭhāsā rūpappamāṇā, eko na rūpappamāṇo. Pañca koṭṭhāse katvā cattāro koṭṭhāsā ghosappamāṇā, eko na ghosappamāṇo. Dasa koṭṭhāse katvā nava koṭṭhāsā lūkhappamāṇā, eko na lūkhappamāṇo. Satasahassaṃ koṭṭhāse katvā pana eko koṭṭhāsova dhammappamāṇo, sesā na dhammappamāṇā. Evamayaṃ catuppamāṇo lokasannivāso.

[03]Etasmiṃ catuppamāṇe lokasannivāse buddhesu appasannā mandā, pasannāva bahukā. Rūpappamāṇassa hi buddharūpato uttari pasādāvahaṃ rūpaṃ nāma natthi. Ghosappamāṇassa buddhānaṃ kittighosato uttari pasādāvaho ghoso nāma natthi. Lūkhappamāṇassa kāsikāni vatthāni mahārahāni ^a^V0.0078^ea^^a^M0.0081^ea^ kañcanabhājanāni tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike sabbasampattiyutte pāsādavare pahāya paṃsukūlacīvaraselamayapattarukkhamūlādisenāsanasevino buddhassa bhagavato lūkhato uttari pasādāvahaṃ aññaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthi. Dhammappamāṇassa sadevake loke asādhāraṇasīlādiguṇassa tathāgatassa sīlādiguṇato uttari pasādāvaho añño sīlādiguṇo nāma natthi. Iti bhagavā imaṃ catuppamāṇikaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ muṭṭhinā gahetvā viya ṭhitoti.

[03]^b^173^eb^^b^.^eb^ Attahitāya paṭipannādīsu – ^b^sīlasampanno^eb^ti sīlena sampanno samannāgato. ^b^Samādhisampanno^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca sīlaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ kathitaṃ. Tathā samādhipaññā ca. ^b^Vimutti^eb^ arahattaphalavimuttiyeva. ^b^Ñāṇadassanaṃ^eb^ ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. ^b^No para^eb^ntiādīsu – parapuggalaṃ ‘‘tayāpi sīlasampannena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vatvā yathā sīlaṃ samādiyati, evaṃ na samādapeti, na gaṇhāpeti. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Etesu pana catūsu paṭhamo vakkalittherasadiso hoti. Dutiyo upanandasakyaputtasadiso ^a^P0.0231^ea^. Tatiyo sāriputtamoggallānattherasadiso. Catuttho devadattasadisoti veditabbo.

[03]^b^174^eb^^b^.^eb^ Attantapādīsu – attānaṃ tapati dukkhāpetīti ^b^attantapo^eb^. Attano paritāpanānuyogaṃ ^b^attaparitāpanānuyogaṃ. Acelako^eb^ti niccelo, naggo. ^b^Muttācāro^eb^ti visaṭṭhācāro. Uccārakammādīsu lokiyakulaputtācārena virahito ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karoti, passāvaṃ karoti, khādati, bhuñjati ca. ^b^Hatthāpalekhano^eb^ti hatthe piṇḍamhi niṭṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ apalekhati. Uccāraṃ vā katvā hatthasmiññeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalekhatīti dasseti. Te kira daṇḍakaṃ sattoti paññapenti. Tasmā tesaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrento evaṃ karoti. Bhikkhāgahaṇatthaṃ ‘ehi bhaddante’ti vutto, na etīti ^b^naehibhaddantiko^eb^. Tena hi ‘tiṭṭha bhaddante’ti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti ^b^natiṭṭhabhaddantiko^eb^. Tadubhayampi hetaṃ titthiyā ‘‘etassa vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī’’ti na karonti. ^b^Abhihaṭa^eb^nti puretaraṃ gahetvā āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ. ^b^Uddissakata^eb^nti ‘‘imaṃ tumhe uddissa kata’’nti evaṃ ārocitabhikkhaṃ. ^b^Na nimantana^eb^nti ‘‘asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā’’ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyati, na gaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Na^eb^^a^M0.0082^ea^^b^kumbhimukhā^eb^ti kumbhito uddharitvā diyyamānaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti. ^b^Na kaḷopimukhā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0079^ea^^b^kaḷopī^eb^ti ukkhali, pacchi vā. Tatopi na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Kumbhī kaḷopiyo kaṭacchunā pahāraṃ labhantīti. ^b^Na eḷakamantara^eb^nti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Ayaṃ maṃ nissāya antarakaraṇaṃ labhatīti. ^b^Daṇḍamusalesu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^Dvinna^eb^nti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhati. Kasmā? Kabaḷantarāyo hotīti. ^b^Na gabbhiniyā^eb^tiādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati. ^b^Pāyantiyā^eb^ dārakassa khīrantarāyo hoti. ^b^Purisantaragatāya^eb^ ratiantarāyo hotīti na gaṇhāti ^b^na saṅkittīsū^eb^ti saṅkittetvā katabhattesu. Dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā ^a^P0.0232^ea^ bhattaṃ pacanti, ukkaṭṭhācelako tato na paṭiggaṇhāti. ^b^Na yattha sā^eb^ti yattha sunakho ‘piṇḍaṃ labhissāmī’ti upaṭṭhito hoti, tattha tassa adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Etassa piṇḍantarāyo hotīti.

[03]^b^Saṇḍasaṇḍacārinī^eb^ti samūhasamūhacārinī. Sace hi acelakaṃ disvā ‘imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā’ti mānussakā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti, tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti, tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Maṃ nissāya makkhikānaṃ gocarantarāyo jātoti. ^b^Thusodaka^eb^nti sabbasassasambhārehi kataṃ sovīrakaṃ. Ettha ca surāpānameva sāvajjaṃ. Ayaṃ pana etasmimpi sāvajjasaññī. ^b^Ekāgāriko^eb^ti yo ekasmiṃyeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā nivattati. ^b^Ekālopiko^eb^ti yo ekeneva ālopena yāpeti. ^b^Dvāgārikā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Ekissāpi dattiyā^eb^ti ekāya dattiyā. Datti nāma ekā khuddakapāti hoti, yattha aggabhikkhaṃ pakkhipitvā ṭhapenti.

[03]^b^Ekāhika^eb^nti ekadivasantarikaṃ. ^b^Aḍḍhamāsika^eb^nti aḍḍhamāsantarikaṃ. ^b^Pariyāyabhattabhojana^eb^nti vārabhattabhojanaṃ. Ekāhavārena dvīhavārena sattāhavārena aḍḍhamāsavārenāti – evaṃ divasavārena ābhatabhattabhojanaṃ. ^b^Sākabhakkho^eb^ti allasākabhakkho. ^b^Sāmākabhakkho^eb^ti sāmākataṇḍulabhakkho. Nīvārādīsu – ^b^nīvārā^eb^ nāma tāva araññe sayaṃ jātā vīhijāti. ^b^Daddula^eb^nti cammakārehi cammaṃ vilikhitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ. ^b^Haṭaṃ^eb^ vuccati ^a^M0.0083^ea^ silesopi, sevālopi kaṇikārādirukkhaniyyāsopi. ^b^Kaṇa^eb^nti kuṇḍakaṃ. ^b^Ācāmo^eb^ti bhattaukkhalikāya laggo jhāmodano. Taṃ chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne gahetvā khādati. ‘‘Odanakañjiya’’ntipi vadanti. ^b^Piññākā^eb^dayo pākaṭā eva. ^b^Pavattaphalabhojī^eb^ti patitaphalabhojī.

[03]^b^Sāṇānī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0080^ea^ sāṇavākacelāni. ^b^Masāṇānī^eb^ti missakacelāni. ^b^Chavadussānī^eb^ti matasarīrato chaḍḍitavatthāni. Erakatiṇādīni vā ganthetvā katanivāsanāni. ^b^Paṃsukūlānī^eb^ti pathaviyaṃ chaḍḍitanantakāni. ^b^Tirīṭānī^eb^ti rukkhattacavatthāni. ^b^Ajina^eb^nti ^a^P0.0233^ea^ ajinamigacammaṃ. ^b^Ajinakkhipa^eb^nti tadeva majjhe phālitaṃ. Sakhurakantipi vadanti. ^b^Kusacīra^eb^nti kusatiṇāni ganthetvā katacīrakaṃ. ^b^Vākacīraphalakacīresu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^Kesakambala^eb^nti manussakesehi katakambalaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ‘‘seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ kesakambalo tesaṃ patikuṭṭho akkhāyatī’’ti (a. ni. 3.138). ^b^Vāḷakambala^eb^nti assavāḷādīhi katakambalaṃ. ^b^Ulūkapakkha^eb^nti ulūkapattāni ganthetvā katanivāsanaṃ. ^b^Ubbhaṭṭhako^eb^ti uddhaṃ ṭhitako.

[03]^b^Ukkuṭikappadhānamanuyutto^eb^ti ukkuṭikavīriyaṃ anuyutto. Gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati. ^b^Kaṇṭakāpassayiko^eb^ti ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karoti. ^b^Seyya^eb^nti sayantopi tattheva seyyaṃ kappeti. Sāyaṃ tatiyamassāti ^b^sāyatatiyakaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Pāto, majjhanhike, sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ pāpaṃ pavāhessāmī’’ti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharati.

[03]^b^175^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paraṃ tapatīti ^b^parantapo^eb^. Paresaṃ paritāpanānuyogaṃ ^b^paraparitāpanānuyogaṃ^eb^. Orabbhikādīsu – urabbhā vuccanti eḷakā. Urabbhe hanatīti ^b^orabbhiko. Sūkarikā^eb^dīsupi – eseva nayo. ^b^Luddo^eb^ti dāruṇo kakkhaḷo. ^b^Macchaghātako^eb^ti macchabandho kevaṭṭo. ^b^Bandhanāgāriko^eb^ti bandhanāgāragopako. ^b^Kurūrakammantā^eb^ti dāruṇakammantā.

[03]^b^176^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Muddhāvasitto^eb^ti khattiyābhisekena muddhani abhisitto. ^b^Puratthimena nagarassā^eb^ti nagarato puratthimadisāya. ^b^Sandhāgāra^eb^nti yaññasālaṃ ^a^M0.0084^ea^. ^b^Kharājinaṃ nivāsetvā^eb^ti sakhuraṃ ajinacammaṃ nivāsetvā. ^b^Sappitelenā^eb^ti sappinā ca telena ca. Ṭhapetvā hi sappiṃ avaseso yo koci sneho telanti vuccati. ^b^Kaṇḍuvamāno^eb^ti nakhānaṃ chinnattā kaṇḍuvitabbakāle tena kaṇḍuvamāno. ^b^Anantarahitāyā^eb^ti asanthatāya. ^b^Sarūpavacchāyā^eb^ti sadisavacchāya. Sace gāvī setā hoti, vacchopi setakova sace kabarā vā, rattā vā, vacchopi tādisovāti – evaṃ sarūpavacchāya. ^b^So evamāhā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0234^ea^ so rājā evaṃ vadeti. ^b^Vacchatarā^eb^ti taruṇavacchakabhāvaṃ atikkantā ^a^V0.0081^ea^ balavavacchā. ^b^Vacchatarīsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^Barihisatthāyā^eb^ti parikkhepakaraṇatthāya ceva yaññabhūmiyaṃ attharaṇatthāya ca.

[03]^b^177^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. ^b^Nicchāto^eb^ti chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā, sā assa natthīti nicchāto. Sabbakilesānaṃ nibbutattā ^b^nibbuto^eb^. Anto tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā sītalo jātoti ^b^sītībhūto^eb^. Jhānamaggaphalanibbānasukhāni paṭisaṃvedetīti ^b^sukhappaṭisaṃvedī^eb^. ^b^Brahmabhūtena attanā^eb^ti seṭṭhabhūtena attanā.

[03]Imaṃ pana puggalaṃ buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ – ^b^idha tathāgato^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato – tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathāvāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato, abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgatoti. ^b^Arahaṃ sammāsambuddho^eb^tiādīni ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ vitthāritāneva. ^b^Taṃ dhamma^eb^nti taṃ vuttappakārasampadaṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^Suṇāti gahapati vā^eb^ti kasmā paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisati? Nihatamānattā ussannattā ca. Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti. Brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti. Hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. Gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā tādisassa mānassa abhāvato nihatamānadappā honti. Te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ ^a^M0.0085^ea^ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ. Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā nāma na bahukā, gahapatikāva bahukā. Iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.

[03]^b^Aññatarasmiṃ vā^eb^ti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. ^b^Paccājāto^eb^ti patijāto. ^b^Tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatī^eb^ti parisuddhaṃ ^a^P0.0235^ea^ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammassāmimhi tathāgate ‘‘sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā’’ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. ^b^Iti paṭisañcikkhatī^eb^ti evaṃ paccavekkhati. ^b^Sambādho gharāvāso^eb^ti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti, tathāpi nesaṃ sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhoyeva. ^b^Rajopatho^eb^ti rāgarajādīnaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^V0.0082^ea^ vuttaṃ. Āgamanapathotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Alagganaṭṭhena abbhokāso viyāti ^b^abbhokāso^eb^. Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsāde ca devavimānādīsu ca supihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati, na sajjati, na bajjhati. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘‘abbhokāso pabbajjā’’ti.

[03]Apica – sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya okāsābhāvato. Rajopatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato. Abbhokāso pabbajjā kusalakiriyāya yathāsukhaṃ okāsasambhāvato. ^b^Nayidaṃ sukaraṃ…pe… pabbajeyya^eb^nti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepakathā – yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ^b^ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ^eb^. Ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ^b^ekantaparisuddhaṃ. Saṅkhalikhitaṃ^eb^ likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ. Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ – ‘‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyya’’nti. Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ ‘‘agāriya’’nti vuccati, tañca pabbajjāya natthi, tasmā pabbajjā ‘‘anagāriya’’nti ñātabbā. ^b^Taṃ anagāriyaṃ. Pabbajeyya^eb^nti ^a^M0.0086^ea^ paṭipajjeyyaṃ. ^b^Appaṃ vā^eb^ti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti, sahassato paṭṭhāya ^a^P0.0236^ea^ mahā. Abandhanaṭṭhena ñātiyeva ^b^ñātiparivaṭṭo^eb^. Sopi vīsatiyā heṭṭhā appo hoti, vīsatiyā paṭṭhāya mahā.

[03]^b^178^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno^eb^ti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca. Yattha cete saha jīvanti, ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti, taṃ bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ sājīvañca. Tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno. Samāpanno^eb^ti sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho. ^b^Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā^eb^tiādīsu pāṇātipātādikathā heṭṭhā vitthāritā eva. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti imaṃ pāṇātipātacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā. ^b^Paṭivirato hotī^eb^ti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova hoti. ^b^Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho^eb^ti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti ^a^V0.0083^ea^ attho. Ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ, sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vināsanabhāvato ‘sattha’nti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalikaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti, na taṃ parūpaghātatthāya. Tasmā nihitadaṇḍā nihitasatthātveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. ^b^Lajjī^eb^ti pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgato. ^b^Dayāpanno^eb^ti dayaṃ mettacittataṃ āpanno. ^b^Sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī^eb^ti sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampako. Tāya dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho. ^b^Viharatī^eb^ti iriyati, pāleti.

[03]Dinnameva ādiyatīti ^b^dinnādāyī^eb^. Cittenapi dinnameva paṭikaṅkhatīti ^b^dinnapāṭikaṅkhī^eb^. Thenetīti theno. Na thenena ^b^athenena^eb^. Athenattāyeva ^b^sucibhūtena. Attanā^eb^ti attabhāvena. Athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Abrahmacariya^eb^nti ^a^M0.0087^ea^ aseṭṭhacariyaṃ. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ācāraṃ caratīti ^b^brahmacārī^eb^. ^b^Ārācārī^eb^ti abrahmacariyato dūracārī. ^b^Methunā^eb^ti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā. ^b^Gāmadhammā^eb^ti gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammā.

[03]Saccaṃ ^a^P0.0237^ea^ vadatīti ^b^saccavādī^eb^. Saccena saccaṃ sandahati ghaṭetīti ^b^saccasandho^eb^. Na antarantarā musā vadatīti attho. Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati, kadāci saccaṃ, tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati, tasmā na so saccasandho. Ayaṃ pana na tādiso. Jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho. ^b^Theto^eb^ti thiro, thirakathoti attho. Eko hi puggalo haliddirāgo viya, thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇuko viya, assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca, na thirakatho hoti. Eko pāsāṇalekhā viya, indakhīlo viya ca thirakatho hoti. Asinā sīse chindantepi dve kathā na katheti. Ayaṃ vuccati theto. ^b^Paccayiko^eb^ti pattiyāyitabbako, saddhāyikoti attho. Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti. ‘Idaṃ kena vuttaṃ? Asukenā’ti vutte ‘mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā’ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Eko paccayiko hoti. ‘Idaṃ kena vuttaṃ? Asukenā’ti vutte ‘yadi tena vuttaṃ, idameva pamāṇaṃ, idāni upaparikkhitabbaṃ natthi, evameva ida’nti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Ayaṃ vuccati paccayiko. ^b^Avisaṃvādako lokassā^eb^ti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.

[03]^b^Imesaṃ^eb^^a^V0.0084^ea^^b^bhedāyā^eb^ti yesaṃ ito sutvāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ, tesaṃ bhedāya. ^b^Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātā^eb^ti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā – ‘tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ, evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta’ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā. ^b^Anuppadātā^eb^ti sandhānānuppadātā. Dve jane samagge disvā – ‘tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ, evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ ^a^M0.0088^ea^ anucchavikameta’ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho. Samaggo ārāmo assāti ^b^samaggārāmo^eb^. Yattha samaggā natthi, tattha vasitumpi na icchatīti attho. Samaggarāmotipi pāḷi. Ayameva attho. ^b^Samaggarato^eb^ti samaggesu rato. Te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho. Samagge disvāpi sutvāpi nandatīti ^b^samagganandī. Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā^eb^ti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti, taṃ sāmaggīguṇaparidīpakameva ^a^P0.0238^ea^ vācaṃ bhāsati, na itaranti.

[03]Kālena vadatīti ^b^kālavādī^eb^. Vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. Bhūtaṃ tathaṃ tacchaṃ sabhāvameva vadatīti ^b^bhūtavādī.^eb^ Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthasannissitameva katvā vadatīti ^b^atthavādī^eb^. Navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti ^b^dhammavādī^eb^. Saṃvaravinayapahānavinayasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti ^b^vinayavādī^eb^. Nidhānaṃ vuccati ṭhapanokāso. Nidhānamassa atthīti ^b^nidhānavatī^eb^. Hadaye nidhātabbayuttakaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti attho. ^b^Kālenā^eb^ti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca ‘‘ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī’’ti na akālena bhāsati. Yuttakālaṃ pana sallakkhetvāva bhāsatīti attho. ^b^Sāpadesa^eb^nti saupamaṃ, sakāraṇanti attho. ^b^Pariyantavati^eb^nti paricchedaṃ dassetvā. Yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati, evaṃ bhāsatīti attho. ^b^Atthasaṃhita^eb^nti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati. Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati, tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati. Na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^179^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā^eb^ti mūlabījaṃ, khandhabījaṃ, phaḷubījaṃ, aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā. Chedanabhedanapacanādibhāvena vikopanā paṭiviratoti attho. ^b^Ekabhattiko^eb^ti pātarāsabhattaṃ, sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni. Tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ antomajjhanhikena paricchinnaṃ. Itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ antoaruṇena. Tasmā antomajjhanhike ^a^V0.0085^ea^ dasakkhattuṃ ^a^M0.0089^ea^ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ekabhattikoti. Rattiyā bhojanaṃ ratti, tato uparatoti ^b^rattūparato^eb^. Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyasatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma, tato viratattā ^b^virato vikālabhojanā^eb^. Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ. Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccanāpanādivasenapi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā dassanā cāti ^b^naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā^eb^. Naccādīni ^a^P0.0239^ea^ hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā yuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti. Mālādīsu – ^b^mālā^eb^ti yaṃkiñci pupphaṃ. ^b^Gandha^eb^nti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ. ^b^Vilepana^eb^nti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. Tattha piḷandhanto dhāreti nāma. Ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrento maṇḍeti nāma. Gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma. ^b^Ṭhānaṃ^eb^ vuccati kāraṇaṃ. Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratoti attho. ^b^Uccāsayanaṃ^eb^ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ. ^b^Mahāsayanaṃ^eb^ akappiyasanthataṃ, tato paṭiviratoti attho. ^b^Jātarūpa^eb^nti suvaṇṇaṃ. ^b^Rajata^eb^nti kahāpaṇo, lohamāsako, jatumāsako, dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchanti. Tassa ubhayassāpi paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato, neva naṃ uggaṇhāti, na uggaṇhāpeti, na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatīti attho.

[03]^b^Āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti sālivīhiyavagodhumakaṅguvarakakudrūsakasaṅkhātassa sattavidhassāpi āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. Na kevalañca etesaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva, āmasanampi bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamacchamaṃsānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, no āmasanaṃ. ^b^Itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti ettha ^b^itthī^eb^ti purisantaragatā. Itarā kumārikā nāma. Tāsaṃ paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva. ^b^Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati. ‘Kappiyakārakaṃ dammi’, ‘ārāmikaṃ dammī’ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati. ^b^Ajeḷakā^eb^dīsupi ^b^khettavatthu^eb^pariyosānesu kappiyākappiyanayo vinayavasena upaparikkhitabbo. Tattha ^b^khettaṃ^eb^ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati. ^b^Vatthu^eb^ nāma yasmiṃ aparaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Yattha vā ubhayampi ^a^M0.0090^ea^ ruhati taṃ khettaṃ. Tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. Khettavatthusīsena cettha vāpitaḷākādīnipi saṅgahitāneva.

[03]^b^Dūteyyaṃ^eb^ vuccati dūtakammaṃ. Gihīnaṃ pahitaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ ^a^V0.0086^ea^. ^b^Pahīṇagamanaṃ^eb^ vuccati paragharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ. ^b^Anuyogo^eb^ nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṃ. Tasmā dūteyyapahīṇagamanānaṃ anugoti ^a^P0.0240^ea^ evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Kayavikkayā^eb^ti kayā ca vikkayā ca. Tulākūṭādīsu – ^b^kūṭa^eb^nti vañcanaṃ. Tattha tulākūṭaṃ nāma rūpakūṭaṃ, aṅgakūṭaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ, paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha ^b^rūpakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya deti. ^b^Aṅgakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge. ^b^Gahaṇakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. ^b^Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.

[03]^b^Kaṃso^eb^ vuccati suvaṇṇapāti. Tāya vañcanaṃ ^b^kaṃsakūṭaṃ^eb^. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti, tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhakulaṃ pavisitvā suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā’ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti. Tato tehi ‘kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo’ti vutte ‘vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā’ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.

[03]^b^Mānakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma hadayabhedasikhābhedarajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha ^b^hadayabhedo^eb^ sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhā chiddena mānena ‘saṇikaṃ āsiñcā’ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti. Dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti. ^b^Sikhābhedo^eb^ tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti. Dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti. ^b^Rajjubhedo^eb^ khettavatthuminanakāle labbhati. Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.

[03]Ukkoṭanādīsu ^a^M0.0091^ea^ – ^b^ukkoṭana^eb^nti assāmike sāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Vañcana^eb^nti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. Tatridamekaṃ vatthu – eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati. Tameko dhutto – ‘‘kiṃ bho migo agghati, kiṃ migapotako’’ti āha. ‘‘Migo dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka’’nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto ^a^P0.0241^ea^, ‘‘na me bho migapotakena attho, migaṃ me dehī’’ti āha. Tena hi ‘‘dve kahāpaṇe dehī’’ti. So āha – ‘‘nanu te, bho, mayā paṭhamaṃ ^a^V0.0087^ea^ eko kahāpaṇo dinno’’ti? ‘‘Āma dinno’’ti. Idampi migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghaṇako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti. So ‘‘kāraṇaṃ vadatī’’ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.

[03]^b^Nikatī^eb^ti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti, amaṇiṃ maṇīti, asuvaṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇanti katvā patirūpakena vañcanaṃ. ^b^Sāciyogo^eb^ti kuṭilayogo. Etesaṃyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṃ nāmaṃ. Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ ‘sāciyogo’ti vadanti. Taṃ pana vañcaneneva saṅgahitaṃ.

[03]Chedanādīsu – ^b^chedana^eb^nti hatthacchedanādi. ^b^Vadho^eb^ti māraṇaṃ. ^b^Bandho^eb^ti rajjubandhanādīhi bandhanaṃ. ^b^Viparāmoso^eb^ti himaviparāmoso, gumbaviparāmosoti duvidho. Yañhi himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti, ayaṃ ^b^himaviparāmoso^eb^. Yaṃ gumbādīhi paṭicchannā musanti, ayaṃ ^b^gumbaviparāmoso. Ālopo^eb^ vuccati gāmanigamādīnaṃ vilopakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Sahasākāro^eb^ti sāhasikakiriyā. Gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ. Evametasmā chedana…pe… sahasākārā paṭivirato hoti.

[03]^b^180^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^So santuṭṭho hotī^eb^ti so catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti. ^b^Kāyaparihārikenā^eb^ti kāyaṃ pariharaṇamattakena. ^b^Kucchiparihārikenā^eb^ti kucchipariharaṇamattakena. ^b^Samādāyeva pakkamatī^eb^ti aṭṭhavidhaṃ bhikkhu parikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvāva kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati. ‘‘Mama ^a^M0.0092^ea^ vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko’’ti saṅgo vā baddho vā na hoti. So jiyā muttasaro viya yūthā pakkanto, mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapatthaṃ pabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto ekova tiṭṭhati, ekova nisīdati. Sabbiriyāpathesu ekova adutiyo.
[21]‘‘Cātuddiso ^a^P0.0242^ea^ appaṭigho ca hoti,
[27]Santussamāno itarītarena;
[26]Parissayānaṃ ^a^V0.0088^ea^ sahitā achambhī,
[22]Eko care khaggavisāṇakappo’’ti. (su. ni. 42);
[03]Evaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ khaggavisāṇakappataṃ āpajjati.

[03]Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento, ^b^‘‘seyyathāpī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^pakkhī sakuṇo^eb^ti pakkhayutto sakuṇo. ^b^Ḍetī^eb^ti uppatati. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – sakuṇo nāma ‘‘asukasmiṃ padese rukkho paripakkaphalo’’ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti. ‘‘Idaṃ ajjatanāya, idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī’’ti tesaṃ na hoti. Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti, na tattha pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti. Atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati, so tena sapattabhārova uppatitvā gacchati. Evameva ^b^ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo^eb^ nirapekkhoyeva pakkamati, tena vuttaṃ samādāyeva pakkamatīti. ^b^Ariyenā^eb^ti niddosena. ^b^Ajjhatta^eb^nti sake attabhāve. ^b^Anavajjasukha^eb^nti niddosasukhaṃ.

[03]^b^181^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā^eb^ti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho. Sesapadesupi yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^Abyāsekasukha^eb^nti kilesehi anavasittasukhaṃ. Avikiṇṇasukhantipi vuttaṃ. Indriyasaṃvarasukhañhi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^182^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^So^eb^^a^M0.0093^ea^^b^abhikkante paṭikkante^eb^ti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu satisampajaññavasena sampajānakārī hoti. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ ^b^jhānavibhaṅge^eb^ vuttameva.

[03]^b^So iminā cā^eb^tiādinā kiṃ dasseti? Araññavāsassa paccayasampattiṃ dasseti. Yassa hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi ^a^P0.0243^ea^, tassa araññavāso na ijjhati, tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Araññe adhivatthā devatā ‘‘kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno araññavāsenā’’ti bheravaṃ saddaṃ sāventi. Hatthehi sīsaṃ paharitvā palāyanākāraṃ karonti ^a^V0.0089^ea^. ‘‘Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī’’ti ayaso pattharati. Yassa panete cattāro paccayā atthi, tassa araññavāso ijjhati. So hi attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati. Araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti. Itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti. ^b^Vivitta^eb^ntiādīni heṭṭhā vuttatthāneva. ^b^So evaṃ samāhite citte…pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānātī^eb^ti ettake ṭhāne yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ vuttameva.

[03]^b^185^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyavijjāya ^b^so evaṃ samāhite citte^eb^ti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā^eb^ti arahattamaggañāṇatthāya. Arahattamaggo hi āsavānaṃ vināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati. Tatra cetaṃ ñāṇaṃ tappariyāpannattāti. ^b^Cittaṃ abhininnāmetī^eb^ti vipassanācittaṃ abhinīharati. ^b^So idaṃ dukkha^eb^nti evamādīsu – ‘‘ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo’’ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, paṭivijjhati. Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ – ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti; tadubhayampi yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhati, taṃ tesaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ – ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti; tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ – ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, paṭivijjhatīti – evamattho veditabbo.

[03]Evaṃ ^a^M0.0094^ea^ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ^b^ime āsavā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ^eb^^a^P0.0244^ea^^b^passato^eb^ti tassa evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ katheti. ^b^Kāmāsavā^eb^ti kāmāsavato. ^b^Vimuccatī^eb^ti iminā maggakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. ^b^Vimuttasmi^eb^nti iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Maggakkhaṇe hi cittaṃ vimuccati, phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇa^eb^nti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti. ^b^Khīṇā jātī^eb^tiādīhi tassa bhūmiṃ. Tena hi ñāṇena so paccavekkhanto ‘khīṇā jātī’tiādīni pajānāti. ^b^Vusita^eb^nti vuṭṭhaṃ parivuṭṭhaṃ kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^nti maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma. Khīṇāsavo vuṭṭhavāso. Tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto ^b^vusitaṃ brahmacariya^eb^nti pajānāti. ^b^Kataṃ karaṇīya^eb^nti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi ^a^V0.0090^ea^ pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ karonti; khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo. Tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto. ‘‘Kataṃ karaṇīya’’nti pajānāti. ^b^Nāparaṃ itthattāyā^eb^ti ‘‘idāni puna etthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ natthī’’ti pajānāti.
[03]^b^186^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sarāgādīsu – ^b^appahīno^eb^ti vikkhambhanappahānena vā tadaṅgappahānena vā samucchedappahānena vā appahīno.

[03]^b^187^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lābhī hotī^eb^tiādīsu – ^b^lābhī^eb^ti lābhavā paṭilabhitvā ṭhito. ^b^Ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassā^eb^ti niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte attano citte uppannassa cetosamathassa. ^b^Adhipaññādhammavipassanāyā^eb^ti adhipaññāsaṅkhātāya khandhadhammesu aniccādivasena pavattāya vipassanāya. ^b^Rūpasahagatāna^eb^nti rūpanimittārammaṇānaṃ rūpāvacarasamāpattīnaṃ. ^b^Arūpasahagatāna^eb^nti na rūpanimittārammaṇānaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ. Ettha ca paṭhamo aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī puthujjano. Dutiyo sukkhavipassakaariyasāvako. Tatiyo aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ^a^P0.0245^ea^ ariyasāvako. Catuttho lokiyamahājano veditabbo.

[03]^b^188^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anusotagāmīādīsu – ^b^anusotagāmī^eb^ti vaṭṭasotaṃ anugato, vaṭṭasote nimuggo puthujjano veditabbo. ^b^Paṭisotagāmī^eb^ti paṭisotagamano ^a^M0.0095^ea^. Anusotaṃ agantvā paṭisotaṃ gacchantassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Pāpañca kammaṃ na karotī^eb^ti paññattaṃ vītikkamanto na karoti. ^b^Sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenā^eb^ti kilesapariyuṭṭhāne sati uppannena dukkhadomanassena saddhimpi. ^b^Paripuṇṇa^eb^nti tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ ekāyapi anūnaṃ. ^b^Parisuddha^eb^nti nirupakkilesaṃ. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^nti seṭṭhacariyaṃ. Iminā vārena sotāpannasakadāgāmino kathitā. Kiṃ pana te rudantā brahmacariyaṃ carantīti? Āma. Kilesarodanena rudantā caranti nāma. Sīlasampanno puthujjanabhikkhupi ettheva saṅgahito.

[03]^b^Ṭhitatto^eb^ti ṭhitasabhāvo. ^b^Anāgāmī^eb^ti kāmarāgabyāpādehi akampanīyacittatāya ca tamhā lokā anāvattidhammatāya ca ṭhitasabhāvo nāma. ^b^Tiṇṇo^eb^ti taṇhāsotaṃ uttiṇṇo. ^b^Pāraṅgato^eb^ti nibbānapāraṃ ^a^V0.0091^ea^ gato. ^b^Thale tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti arahattaphalasamāpattithale tiṭṭhati. ^b^Cetovimutti^eb^nti phalasamādhiṃ. ^b^Paññāvimutti^eb^nti phalañāṇaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ khīṇāsavo ‘‘tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo’’ti vuccati. Bāhitapāpatāya hi esa ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ nāma.

[03]^b^189^eb^^b^.^eb^ Appassutādīsu – ^b^appakaṃ sutaṃ hotī^eb^ti navaṅge satthusāsane kiñcideva thokaṃ sutaṃ hoti. ^b^Na atthamaññāya, na dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammapaṭipanno hotī^eb^ti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca jānitvā lokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno na hoti. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^190^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samaṇamacalādīsu – ^b^samaṇamacalo^eb^ti samaṇaacalo, makāro padasandhikaro. Niccalasamaṇo, thirasamaṇoti attho ^a^P0.0246^ea^. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ sotāpanno sāsane mūlajātāya saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā ‘samaṇamacalo’ti vuccati. Sakadāgāmī pana rajjanakilesassa atthitāya ^b^samaṇapadumo^eb^ti vutto. Rattaṭṭho hi idha padumaṭṭho nāmāti vuttaṃ. Anāgāmī kāmarāgasaṅkhātassa rajjanakilesassa natthitāya ^b^samaṇapuṇḍarīko^eb^ti vutto. Paṇḍaraṭṭho hi idha puṇḍarīkaṭṭho nāmāti vuttaṃ ^a^M0.0096^ea^. Khīṇāsavo ca thaddhabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena ^b^samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo^eb^ nāmāti vutto. Appadukkhaṭṭhenapi cesa samaṇasukhumāloyevāti.
[06]Catukkaniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^191^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcake – ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tesu ‘‘ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī’’tiādinā nayena heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhapuggalesu. ^b^Yvāya^eb^nti yo ayaṃ. ^b^Ārabhatī^eb^ti ettha ārambhasaddo kammakiriyāhiṃsanavīriyavikopanāpattivītikkamesu vattati. Tathā hesa ‘‘yaṃkiñci dukkhaṃ sambhoti, sabbaṃ ārambhapaccayā’’ti (su. ni. 748) kamme āgato. ‘‘Mahāyaññā mahārambhā, na te honti mahapphalā’’ti (a. ni. 4.39) kiriyāyaṃ. ‘‘Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa ^a^V0.0092^ea^ pāṇaṃ ārabhantī’’ti (ma. ni. 2.51-52) hiṃsane. ‘‘Ārabhatha, nikkhamatha, yuñjatha buddhasāsane’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.185) vīriye. ‘‘Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hotī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.10, 194; ma. ni. 1.293) vikopane. ‘‘Ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī’’ti (a. ni. 5.142) ayaṃ pana āpattivītikkame āgato. Tasmā āpattivītikkamavasena ārabhati ceva tappaccayā vippaṭisārī ca hotīti ayamettha attho.

[03]^b^Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī^eb^ti anadhigatattā yathāsabhāvato na jānāti. ^b^Yatthassā^eb^ti yasmiṃ assa, yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā etassa puggalassa uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantīti attho. Kiṃ pana patvā te nirujjhantīti? Arahattamaggaṃ. Phalappattassa pana niruddhā nāma honti. Evaṃ ^a^P0.0247^ea^ santepi idha maggakiccavasena phalameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Ārambhajā^eb^ti āpattivītikkamasambhavā. ^b^Vippaṭisārajā^eb^ti vippaṭisārato jātā. ^b^Pavaḍḍhantī^eb^ti punappunaṃ uppajjanena vaḍḍhanti. ^b^Sādhū^eb^ti āyācanasādhu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yāva aparaddhañca vata āyasmatā, evaṃ santepi mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ yācāma – ‘‘desetabbayuttakassa desanāya, vuṭṭhātabbayuttakassa vuṭṭhānena, āvikātabbayuttakassa āvikiriyāya, ārambhaje āsave ^a^M0.0097^ea^ pahāya, suddhante ṭhitabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vippaṭisāraje āsave paṭivinodetvā nīharitvā vipassanācittañceva vipassanāpaññañca bhāvetū’’ti. ^b^Amunā pañcamena puggalenā^eb^ti etena pañcamena khīṇāsavapuggalena. ^b^Samasamo bhavissatī^eb^ti lokuttaraguṇehi samabhāveneva samo bhavissatīti evaṃ khīṇāsavena ovaditabboti attho.

[03]^b^Ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotī^eb^ti āpattiṃ āpajjati. Taṃ pana desetuṃ sabhāgapuggalaṃ pariyesati. Tasmā na vippaṭisārī hoti. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘vuṭṭhitattā na vippaṭisārī hotī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Na ārabhati vippaṭisārī hotī^eb^ti āpattiṃ nāpajjati, vinayapaññattiyaṃ pana akovidattā anāpattiyaṃ āpattisaññī hutvā vippaṭisārī hoti. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘sakiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pacchā kiñcāpi nāpajjati, vippaṭisāraṃ pana vinodetuṃ na sakkotī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Na ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotī^eb^ti neva āpattiṃ āpajjati, na vippaṭisārī hoti. Katamo panesa puggaloti? Ossaṭṭhavīriyapuggalo. So hi ‘‘kiṃ me imasmiṃ buddhakāle parinibbānena, anāgate ^b^metteyyasammāsambuddhakāle^eb^ parinibbāyissāmī’’ti ^a^V0.0093^ea^ visuddhasīlopi paṭipattiṃ na pūreti. Sopi ‘‘kimatthaṃ āyasmā pamatto viharati puthujjanassa nāma gati anibaddhā. Āyasmā hi metteyyasammāsambuddhassa sammukhabhāvaṃ labheyyapi na labheyyāpīti arahattatthāya vipassanaṃ bhāvehī’’ti ovaditabbova. Sesaṃ sabbattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^192^eb^^b^.^eb^ Datvā ^a^P0.0248^ea^ avajānātītiādīsu – eko bhikkhu mahāpuñño catupaccayalābhī hoti. So cīvarādīni labhitvā aññaṃ appapuññaṃ āpucchati. Sopi tasmiṃ punappunaṃ āpucchantepi gaṇhātiyeva. Athassa itaro thokaṃ kupito hutvā maṅkubhāvaṃ uppādetukāmo vadati – ‘‘ayaṃ attano dhammatāya cīvarādīni na labhati, amhe nissāya labhatī’’ti. Evaṃ puggalo ^b^datvā avajānāti^eb^ nāma. Eko pana ekena saddhiṃ dve tīṇi vassāni vasanto pubbe taṃ puggalaṃ garuṃ katvā pacchā gacchante gacchante kāle cittīkāraṃ na karoti, āsanāpi na vuṭṭhāti, upaṭṭhānampi na gacchati. Evaṃ puggalo ^b^saṃvāsena avajānāti^eb^ nāma.

[03]^b^Ādheyyamukho^eb^ti ^a^M0.0098^ea^ ādito dheyyamukho. Paṭhamavacanasmiṃyeva ṭhapitamukhoti attho. ^b^Adhimuccitā hotī^eb^ti saddhātā hoti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo – eko puggalo sāruppaṃyeva bhikkhuṃ ‘asāruppo eso’ti katheti, taṃ sutvā esa niṭṭhaṃ gacchati. Puna aññena sabhāgena bhikkhunā ‘sāruppo aya’nti vuttepi tassa vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti ‘‘asukena nāma ‘asāruppo aya’nti amhākaṃ kathita’’nti purimabhikkhunova kathaṃ gaṇhāti. Aparopissa dussīlaṃ ‘sīlavā’ti katheti. Tassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā puna aññena ‘‘asāruppo esa bhikkhu, nāyaṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ yutto’’ti vuttopi tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā purimasseva kathaṃ gaṇhāti. Aparo vaṇṇampi kathitaṃ gaṇhāti, avaṇṇampi kathitaṃ gaṇhātiyeva. Ayampi ādheyyamukhoyeva nāma. Ādhātabbamukho yaṃ yaṃ suṇāti, tattha tattha ṭhapitamukhoti attho.

[03]^b^Lolo^eb^ti saddhādīnaṃ ittarakālaṭṭhitikattā assaddhiyādīhi lulitabhāvena lolo. ^b^Ittarasaddho^eb^ti parittasaddho, aparipuṇṇasaddho. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ettha pana punappunaṃ bhajanavasena saddhāva ^b^bhatti. Pemaṃ^eb^ saddhāpemaṃ gehasitapemampi vaṭṭati. ^b^Pasādo^eb^ saddhāpasādova. ^b^Evaṃ puggalo lolo hotī^eb^ti evaṃ ittarasaddhāditāya puggalo lolo nāma hoti. Haliddirāgo viya ^a^V0.0094^ea^, thusarāsimhi koṭṭitakhāṇuko viya, assapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ ^a^P0.0249^ea^ viya ca anibaddhaṭṭhāno muhuttena pasīdati, muhuttena kuppati.
[03]^b^Mando momūho^eb^ti aññāṇabhāvena mando avisadatāya momūho. Mahāmūḷhoti attho.

[03]^b^193^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yodhājīvūpamesu – ^b^yodhājīvā^eb^ti yuddhūpajīvino. ^b^Rajagga^eb^nti hatthiassādīnaṃ pādappahārabhinnāya bhūmiyā uggataṃ rajakkhandhaṃ. ^b^Na santhambhatī^eb^ti santhambhitvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^Sahati rajagga^eb^nti rajakkhandhaṃ disvāpi adhivāseti. ^b^Dhajagga^eb^nti hatthiassādipiṭṭhesu vā rathesu vā ussāpitānaṃ dhajānaṃ aggaṃ. ^b^Ussāraṇa^eb^nti hatthiassarathādīnañceva balakāyassa ca uccāsaddamahāsaddaṃ. ^b^Sampahāre^eb^ti samāgate appamattakepi pahāre. ^b^Haññatī^eb^ti vihaññati, vighātaṃ āpajjati. ^b^Byāpajjatī^eb^ti vipattiṃ āpajjati, pakatibhāvaṃ jahati. ^b^Sahati sampahāra^eb^nti dve tayo pahāre patvāpi sahati, adhivāseti ^a^M0.0099^ea^. ^b^Tameva saṅgāmasīsa^eb^nti tameva jayakhandhāvāraṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Ajjhāvasatī^eb^ti sattāhamattaṃ abhibhavitvā āvasati. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Laddhappahārānaṃ pahārajagganatthañceva katakammānaṃ visesaṃ ñatvā ṭhānantaradānatthañca issariyasukhānubhavanatthañca.
[03]^b^194^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni yasmā satthu yodhājīvehi kiccaṃ natthi, imasmiṃ pana sāsane tathārūpe pañca puggale dassetuṃ idaṃ opammaṃ ābhataṃ, tasmā te puggale dassento ^b^evameva^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03]Tattha ^b^saṃsīdatī^eb^ti micchāvitakkasmiṃ visīdati, anupavisati. ^b^Na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretu^eb^nti brahmacariyavāsaṃ anupacchijjamānaṃ gopetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^Sikkhādubbalyaṃ āvikatvā^eb^ti sikkhāya dubbalabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā. ^b^Kimassa rajaggasmi^eb^nti kiṃ tassa puggalassa rajaggaṃ nāmāti vadati. ^b^Abhirūpā^eb^ti abhirūpavatī. ^b^Dassanīyā^eb^ti dassanayoggā. ^b^Pāsādikā^eb^ti dassaneneva cittappasādāvahā. ^b^Paramāyā^eb^ti uttamāya. ^b^Vaṇṇapokkharatāyā^eb^ti sarīravaṇṇena ceva aṅgasaṇṭhānena ca.
[03]^b^196^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ūhasatī^eb^ti avahasati. ^b^Ullapatī^eb^ti katheti. ^b^Ujjagghatī^eb^ti pāṇiṃ paharitvā mahāhasitaṃ ^a^P0.0250^ea^ hasati. ^b^Uppaṇḍetī^eb^ti uppaṇḍanakathaṃ katheti.
[03]^b^197^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhinisīdatī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0095^ea^ abhibhavitvā santike vā ekāsane vā nisīdati. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^Ajjhottharatī^eb^ti avattharati.
[03]^b^198^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Viniveṭhetvā vinimocetvā^eb^ti gahitaṭṭhānato tassa hatthaṃ viniveṭhetvā ceva, mocetvā ca. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.

[03]^b^199^eb^^b^.^eb^ Piṇḍapātikesu – ^b^mandattā momūhattā^eb^ti neva samādānaṃ jānāti, na ānisaṃsaṃ; attano pana mandattā momūhattā aññāṇeneva piṇḍapātiko hoti. ^b^Pāpiccho icchāpakato^eb^ti piṇḍapātikassa me sato ‘‘ayaṃ piṇḍapātiko’’ti catupaccayasakkāraṃ karissanti. Lajjī, appicchotiādīhi ca guṇehi sambhāvessantīti. Evaṃ pāpikāya icchāya ṭhatvā tāya pāpicchāya abhibhūto hutvā piṇḍapātiko hoti. Ummādavasena piṇḍāya caranto pana ^b^ummādā cittavikkhepā piṇḍapātiko^eb^^a^M0.0100^ea^ nāma hoti. ^b^Vaṇṇita^eb^nti idaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ nāma buddhehi ca buddhasāvakehi ca vaṇṇitaṃ pasatthanti piṇḍapātiko hoti. ^b^Appicchataṃyeva nissāyā^eb^tiādīsu – ‘‘iti appiccho bhavissāmi, idaṃ me piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ appicchatāya saṃvattissati; ‘iti santuṭṭho bhavissāmi idaṃ me piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattissati’; ‘iti kilese saṃlikhissāmi’, idaṃ me piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ kilesasallekhanatthāya saṃvattissatī’’ti piṇḍapātiko hoti. ^b^Idamatthita^eb^nti imāya kalyāṇāya paṭipattiyā atthikabhāvaṃ, iminā vā piṇḍapātamattena atthikabhāvaṃ. Yaṃ yaṃ laddhaṃ tena teneva yāpanabhāvaṃ nissāyāti attho. ^b^Aggo^eb^ti jeṭṭhako. Sesāni tasseva vevacanāni.

[03]^b^Gavā khīra^eb^nti gāvito khīraṃ nāma hoti, na vinā gāviyā. ^b^Khīramhā dadhī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Evameva^eb^nti yathā etesu pañcasu gorasesu sappimaṇḍo aggo; evamevaṃ imesu pañcasu piṇḍapātikesu yvāyaṃ appicchatādīni nissāya piṇḍapātiko hoti. Ayaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca pāmokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca. Imesu pana pañcasu piṇḍapātikesu dveva janā piṇḍapātikā ^a^P0.0251^ea^, tayo na piṇḍapātikā. Nāmamattena pana piṇḍapātikāti veditabbā. ^b^Khalupacchābhattikā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayoti.
[06]Pañcakaniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^202^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chakke ^a^V0.0096^ea^ – ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tesu chasu puggalesu. ^b^Sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabbo^eb^ti so puggalo tena anācariyakena attanā uppāditena sabbaññutaññāṇena sabbaññubuddho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Paccekasambuddho tenā^eb^tiādīsupi tena paccekasambodhiñāṇena so puggalo paccekasambuddho. Tena sāvakapāramīñāṇena te puggalā sāriputtamoggallānā. Tena dukkhassa antakaraṇena te puggalā avasesā arahanto. Tena itthattaṃ anāgamanena so puggalo anāgāmī. Tena itthattaṃ āgamanena te puggalā sotāpannasakadāgāmino daṭṭhabbāti.
[06]Chakkaniddesavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^203^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattake ^a^M0.0101^ea^ – ^b^sakiṃ nimuggo^eb^ti ekavāraṃ nimuggo. ^b^Ekantakāḷakehī^eb^ti ekanteneva kāḷakehi natthikavādaahetukavādaakiriyavādasaṅkhātehi niyatamicchādiṭṭhidhammehi. ^b^Evaṃ puggalo^eb^ti iminā kāraṇena puggalo ekavāraṃ nimuggo tathā nimuggova hoti. Etassa hi puna bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti vadanti. Makkhaligosālādayo viya heṭṭhā narakaggīnaṃyeva āhāro hoti.

[03]^b^Sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesū^eb^ti kusaladhammesu saddhā nāma sādhuladdhikāti ummujjati. So tāvatakeneva kusalena ummujjati nāma. ^b^Sādhu hirī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Hāyatiyevā^eb^ti caṅkavāre āsittaudakaṃ viya ekantena parihāyateva. ^b^Evaṃ puggalo^eb^ti evaṃ sāhu saddhāti. Imesaṃ saddhādīnaṃ vasena ekavāraṃ ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā puna nimujjatiyeva, devadattādayo viya. Devadatto hi aṭṭha samāpattiyo, pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvāpi puna buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭakatāya tehi guṇehi parihīno ruhiruppādakammaṃ ^a^P0.0252^ea^ saṅghabhedakammañca ^a^V0.0097^ea^ katvā kāyassa bhedā dutiyacittavārena niraye nibbatti. Kokāliko dve aggasāvake upavaditvā padumaniraye nibbatto.

[03]^b^Neva hāyati no vaḍḍhatī^eb^ti appahonakakālepi na hāyati, pahonakakālepi na vaḍḍhati. Ubhayampi panetaṃ agārikenapi anagārikenapi dīpetabbaṃ. Ekacco hi agāriko appahonakakāle pakkhikabhattaṃ vā salākabhattaṃ vā vassāvāsikaṃ vā upanibandhāpeti. So pacchā pahonakakālepi pakkhikabhattādimattameva pavatteti. Anagārikopi ādimhi appahonakakāle uddesaṃ vā dhutaṅgaṃ vā gaṇhāti, medhābalavīriyasampattiyā pahonakakālepi tato uttariṃ na karoti. ^b^Evaṃ puggalo^eb^ti evaṃ imāya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito nāma hoti.
[03]^b^Ummujjitvā vipassati viloketī^eb^ti sotāpanno puggalo uṭṭhahitvā gamanamaggaṃ gantabbaṃ disaṃ vā āloketi nāma.
[03]^b^Ummujjitvā^eb^^a^M0.0102^ea^^b^pataratī^eb^ti sakadāgāmipuggalo kilesatanutāya uṭṭhahitvā gantabbadisābhimukho patarati nāma.
[03]^b^Patigādhappatto hotī^eb^ti anāgāmipuggalo uṭṭhāya viloketvā pataritvā gantvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpatto nāma hoti, tiṭṭhati, na punāgacchati.
[03]^b^Tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti sabbakilesoghaṃ taritvā paratīraṃ gantvā nibbānathale ṭhito nāma hoti. Ime pana satta puggalā udakopamena dīpitā.

[03]Satta kira jaṅghavāṇijā addhānamaggapaṭipannā antarāmagge ekaṃ puṇṇanadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tesu paṭhamaṃ otiṇṇo udakabhīruko puriso otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjitvā puna uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi, antoyeva macchakacchapabhakkho jāto. Dutiyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāne nimujjitvā sakiṃ uṭṭhahitvā puna nimuggo uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi, antoyeva macchakacchapabhakkho jāto. Tatiyo nimujjitvā uṭṭhahi. So majjhe nadiyā ṭhatvā neva orato āgantuṃ, na parato gantuṃ asakkhi ^a^V0.0098^ea^. Catuttho uṭṭhāya ṭhito uttaraṇatitthaṃ olokesi. Pañcamo otaraṇatitthaṃ oloketvā patari. Chaṭṭho taritvā pārimatīraṃ gantvā kaṭippamāṇe udake ṭhito. Sattamo pārimatīraṃ gantvā gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhātvā varavatthāni ^a^P0.0253^ea^ nivāsetvā surabhivilepanaṃ vilimpitvā nīluppalādīni piḷandhitvā nānālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito mahānagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaramāruyha uttamabhojanaṃ bhuñji.

[03]Tattha satta jaṅghavāṇijā viya ime satta puggalā. Nadī viya vaṭṭaṃ. Paṭhamassa udakabhīrukassa purisassa otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjanaṃ viya micchādiṭṭhikassa vaṭṭe nimujjanaṃ. Ummujjitvā nimuggapuriso viya saddhādīnaṃ uppattimattakena ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā nimuggapuggalo. Majjhe nadiyā ṭhito viya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā ṭhitapuggalo. Uttaraṇatitthaṃ olokento viya gantabbamaggaṃ gantabbadisaṃ vā olokento sotāpanno. Pataritapuriso viya kilesatanutāya pataranto sakadāgāmī. Taritvā kaṭimatte udake ṭhitapuriso viya anāvattitadhammatāya ṭhito anāgāmī. Nhatvā pārimatīraṃ ^a^M0.0103^ea^ uttaritvā thale ṭhitapuriso viya cattāro oghe atikkamitvā nibbānathale ṭhito khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo. Thale ṭhitapurisassa nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaraṃ āruyha uttamabhojanabhuñjanaṃ viya khīṇāsavassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā vītināmanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ubhatobhāgavimuttādayo heṭṭhā pakāsitāyevāti.
[06]Sattakaniddesavaṇṇanā.
[03]^b^207^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhakanavakaniddesāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03]^b^209^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasakaniddese – ^b^idhā^eb^ti kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ. Kāmāvacarabhūmiyañhi sattakkhattuparamādīnaṃ kāmāvacarabhūmiyaññeva niṭṭhā hoti. Kāmāvacarattabhāveneva arahattappatti ca anupādisesanibbānappatti ca hotīti attho.

[03]^b^Idha^eb^^a^V0.0099^ea^^b^vihāyā^eb^ti idha kāmāvacare attabhāve vihāya suddhāvāsattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ niṭṭhā hotīti attho. Antarāparinibbāyiādayo hi idha anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā ito cutā suddhāvāsesu uppajjitvā tena attabhāvena arahattañceva anupādisesanibbānadhātuñca ^a^P0.0254^ea^ pāpuṇanti. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘‘imesaṃ pañcannaṃ idha vihāya niṭṭhā’’ti.

[03]Ettāvatā ca –
